subject: UNITED NATION RESIDENT CO-COOR
body:
UNITED NATION RESIDENT CO-COORDINATOR
OFFICER (UNRCO)
THIS IS TO BRING TO YOUR NOTICE THAT UNITED NATION IN CONJUNCTION WITH
FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OF NIGERIA HAS DECIDED TO COMPENSATE ALL SCAM
VICTIMS WITH THE SUM OF 1 MILLION USD, (ONE MILLION UNITED STATE
DOLLARS ONLY) FOR FURTHER INFORMATION CONTACT OUR PRIVATE OFFICER: MR.
UBAKA EDWARD:
Name: Mr. Ubaka Edward,
E-mail: 
mr.ubakaedward@gmail.com
Tel: +234 8084 091729:
YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION PAYMENT THROUGH ATM VISA CARD
PAYMENT. YOU WILL BE DETAILED WITH MODALITIES AS SOON AS YOU CONTACT
THE PRIVATE OFFICER OF THE UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA.
SINCERELY YOURS,
MR. EDWARD KALLON

subject: Re: UNITED NATION RESIDENT CO-COOR
body:
Hello Mr. Edward Kallon,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe the United Nation and the Federal Government of Nigeria are doing such a generous act. It's really heartwarming to know that there are organizations out there looking out for people like me.

I'm curious though, how did you guys decide on compensating with exactly one million USD? And why through an ATM Visa Card payment? Is it because it's more secure or convenient?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

P.S. Please note that I won't be able to provide any personal information online due to security reasons. I hope you understand.

Best wishes,
Roy
